timeline.message: Added translation. Added space between download and remove buttons for reference files. Updated ProjectReferenceFileController to return file size in a human readable format
Added service for project reference files. Updated reference file react component to use drag and drop for file uploads. Added comments

timeline.bodyText: Why are you using a custom class for this, it looks pretty much identical to AjaxSuccessResponse
timeline.author: joshsadam
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+package ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.ria.web.ajax.dto.ajax;

+ * success text.
+ */

replies.bodyText: Which extends to AjaxUpdateItemSuccessResponse, they are all the same.

timeline.message: Added tests, refactored mappings, made react component for drag and drop upload, moved downloading of reference file to ajax controller

timeline.bodyText: This file should be in the ajax package right?
timeline.author: joshsadam

timeline.message: Changed request mapping url to not use camelcase. Removed dependency on page variables

timeline.bodyText: Your controllers should return the ajax response not your services.
timeline.author: joshsadam

timeline.message: Removed referencefilecontrollertest as nothing is left in it. Updated service to return string and left to the ajax controller to return the ajaxresponse. Added Space to components on page
Ran prettier on jsx file. Updated ui tests
Updated user docs. Added accept type to reference file uploads
Removed margin. Added props to DragUpload for uploadText and uploadHint
Removed functions for creating reference file upload and table components and rather have them created directly in the render
Removed unused imports. Updated reference file page disable download button if a file is not found
Updated get project reference files method to use a dto rather than return a map
Changed uireferencefile constructor call for project reference files
Updated UIReferenceFile dto constructor to accept a file size (this was needed to fix testing as well as if there is an exception caught in which the size needs to be set to an error string)
Updated dto to accept size and not attempt to get size inside of constructor
